name: Crazy Zombie Hunt 2018
description: Crazy Zombie Hunt 2018 is the most realistic death war and action game. Become a contract killer, you feel as a soldier, you have to kill all the zombies in your area and clear the houses to kill dangerous zombies. Shooting Zombie game is full action packed. Assassinate the zombie with your favorite sniper weapon because you are a soldier. This game is here for your great excitement time. Use your sniper skills to shoot every target you can in this shooting simulator. Killing zombie is not board game, everybody likes shooting game. This is the best chance for better shooter to test your sniper shooting skills.
